title: Stillmaker
content:
trike Dagger Light Finesse Thrown Range: 1.5/2.5/18 m

Pommel Strike Lacerate Piercing Strike

BG3 Stillmaker Location & Where to Find

Location: Act 3 Wyrm's Crossing inside a cave called "Cave Mouth. Inside a hole at x:65 y:-1015 Quest Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders leads you to this place. (You can find a letter that hints Dolor throw his dagger into this cave).

Stillmaker Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Very Rare Value: 480 Weight: 0.45 UUID: 0cfbd2ef-6eb3-4283-b0c9-8e23a4f9bf8c
